modName: Luke and Noir - standalone male followers
summary: Added two standalone male followers to Skyrim. Hope you like them.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60966-1-1419231424.png[/img]
Luke walks the shadow, trapped in Riften. He wears a foreign suit of armor. No one knows what he's up to.
Noir was brought up in an Orc tribe. He believes strength and righteousness will lead to one's own good.

Whereabouts:
Luke: Temple of Mara in Riften
Noir: Dragons Reach in Whiterun

Skills:
Luke: Archery, Light Armor, Sneak and Marked for death shout
Noir: 2-Hand, Heavy Armor, Sneak and Marked for death shout

Don't like their armors?
They will equip better armors. If they do not wear the armor you give them, just try console commands:
click on them
showinventory
removeitem xxx 1

Credits
Better males by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
Fine Face Textures by Urshi
KS hairdo's

To take the photos
FNIS by fore
Kinoko Pose by cryptoporus
Tekitodayo Pose by fmh66x
Helmet Toggle by Maniczombie
The Witcher 2 Armors for Skyrim by LordOrWar

Known issues
1) Negative armor on the player.
This is a glitch caused by Marked for death shout. Simple fix is to type in console:
player.modav damageresist 4500

2) Why do they wield an "invisible weapon" or a hunting bow every time after they shout even if I gave them a better weapon?
The problem is that the shouts reset their equipped weapon to default ones. The only way to let them re-equip the better weapon is to open their inventory and remove something or give them something.
I couldn't find a way to completely solve this.. [b][size=3]So no shout version is highly recommended[/size][/b], or constant weapon changing could be a pain in the neck.
author: raylivingstone
